thread.title: Mr Trevor Gamble
thread.title_full: Rentalcars.com reviewed by Mr Trevor Gamble

author: Mr Trevor Gamble
title: Mr Trevor Gamble
text: FROM START TO FINISH THE PROCESS WAS A DODDLE I JUST WISH I COULD ASK FOR MY HIRE CAR TO BE BROUGHT TO THE AIRPORT ENTRANCE AS MY WIFE IS HANDICAPPED AND USES A WHEELCHAIR AND IT WOULD MAKE THINGS EASIER BEING ABLE TO LOAD UP OUTSIDE THE AIRPORT ENTRANCE THAN HAVING TO TREK ACROSS THE CAR PARKS.
